item.title: How does the server source link up with the server?
item.dc:creator: @DuhPk DuhPk
item.description:
@DuhPk wrote:

[quote=“tonypker13, post:2, topic:230900”]This is how I BELIEVE it works.
Once again, theres a 99.9% chance im wrong.

I believe when you make your No-Ip and download DUC, it somehow detects runserver.bat and converts that into a server.

Please no1 flame me about this… Im a coder nota server expert :P[/quote]
No Not really
It just sends a connection from the IP to your computer so people can use the IP to connect your COMPUTER when you run the batch file

Read full topic
